description.content: Submits a mailing job with a single document to be sent to one or more recipients. The request body contains job parameters including document source, recipient address information, and payment details.
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "docSourceAll": {
    "url": "https://api.example.com/v1/documents/5678"
  },
  "recipientAddressSource": {
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "address1": "123 Main Street",
    "address2": "Apt 4B",
    "address3": "",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "zip": "10001",
    "country": "USA",
    "nickName": "Johnny",
    "phoneNumber": "+1-555-123-4567"
  },
  "jobTemplate": "template_kgx7QVzO",
  "paymentDetails": {
    "achDetails": {
      "routingNumber": "021000021",
      "accountNumber": "1234567890",
      "checkDigit": 7
    }
  },
  "returnAddress": {
    "firstName": "Harrison",
    "lastName": "Schoen",
    "address1": "124 London Road",
    "city": "Bolingbrook",
    "state": "Iowa",
    "zip": "29541",
    "country": "Hungary",
    "address2": "680 Sycamore Avenue",
    "address3": "84798 Korey Mews"
  },
  "jobOptions": {
    "documentClass": "primary",
    "layout": "primary",
    "productionTime": "2026-02-16T05:52:37.499Z",
    "envelope": "default",
    "color": "default",
    "paperType": "standard",
    "printOption": "default",
    "mailClass": "standard"
  },
  "tags": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ]
}

item.name: Issue or rotate a long-term token

request.name: Issue or rotate a long-term token

description.content:
Issues a long-term token (e.g., 30-90 days) for automation or server-to-server use.
Requires step-up authentication. Choose one of the supported grant types:

- `client_credentials` + `client_secret`
- `client_credentials` + one-time `otp_code`
- `assertion` (e.g., signed JWT by your private key)
- Or an existing short-term token with the `tokens:write` scope

Only one mechanism is required per call.

body.raw:
{
  "grant_type": "assertion",
  "client_id": "ABZTVaal9W",
  "client_secret": "default",
  "otp_code": "standard",
  "assertion_type": "primary",
  "assertion": "basic",
  "scopes": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ],
  "ttl_seconds": "basic"
}
